long_description: At first glance, the women's Smith Spree Sunglasses are timeless, almost retro. Take a closer look and appreciate the modern blending of classic lines and cutting-edge technology. Lenses vary by frame color, but both offer 100% UV ray protection and are highly impact resistant. Scarlet Fade frames have sienna gradient lenses that block 78% of visible light; Black Cherry Fade frames have brown gradient lenses that block 80% of visible light. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants. Smith Spree Sunglasses for women have a hydrophilic nosepiece and temple pads that become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather.
